original: 長年親近權貴，掌管機要，政治影響力甚大。鍾毓、辛憲英、王元姬等皆言不可專任，後果叛變！
text: For many years, he has been close to the powerful, in charge of confidentiality, and has great political influence. Zhong Yu, Xin Xianying, Wang Yuanji, etc. have all said that they cannot be full-time, and the consequences will be rebellious!
